detaileddescription.para: A helper function for checking if a user can add Tripal Content.
This function is a callback for the bio_data/add menu path.
Returns HTML for a list of available node types for node creation.

parameterdescription.para:
An associative array containing:
content: An array of content types.

detaileddescription.para: Provides a list of TripalEntity types (bundles) for the user to add.
This function is a callback in a menu item which is set in the TripalEntityUIController class.
Display a listing of Tripal entities.
Filters and bulk operations needed to be added to this form.

simplesect.para: A form array describing this listing to the Form API.

detaileddescription.para: Provide a data listing for tripal entites (ie: biological data).
This function is a callback in a menu item which is set in the TripalEntityUIController class.
Form callback: confirmation form for deleting a tripal_entity.
An Ajax callback for the tripal_entity_form.
Menu callback to display an entity.
As we load the entity for display, we're responsible for invoking a number of hooks in their proper order.
